author: jprendi
body:
Dear DQM-Integration community,

there has been a new addition of the PF Calo Rechits to the Scouting Event Content for the rest of 2025 data-taking (see (here)[https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48583]). In order to properly test updates in the scouting DQM collections now, new streamer file containing this collection is needed. In this PR, I update the streamer files and json specifically for that stream and updated the documentation to include this new event content.

Thanks in advance!
title: Changing streamer files of streamerDQMOnlineScouting for Run392642
